TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MailDefinition extends System.Object implements class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public NotInheritable Class MailDefinition Implements IStateManager
public ref class MailDefinition sealed : System::Web::UI::IStateManager

summary.span: 允许控件用文本文件或字符串创建电子邮件。

span.span: Allows a control to create email messages from text files or strings.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类可以由控件创建从文本文件或包含电子邮件的正文的字符串对象。The class can be used by controls to create a object from a text file or a string that contains the body of the email message. 使用类，以简化创建预定义的由控件发送的电子邮件。Use the class to simplify creating predefined email messages to be sent by a control. 如果你想要发送电子邮件不使用控件，请参阅类。If you want to send email not using a control, see the class. 可以通过传递到电子邮件的正文中使文本替换方法将字符串映射到它们的替换项的实例。You can make text substitutions in the body of the email message by passing to the method an instance that maps strings to their replacements. 对象创建使用发送类方法的类。The object created by the class is sent using the method of the class. 若要能够发送电子邮件，必须在 Web.config 文件中配置 SMTP 邮件服务器。To be able to send email, you must configure an SMTP mail server in your Web.config file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ <smtp>元素 （网络设置）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/smtp-element-network-settings.md)。For more information, see the [<smtp> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/smtp-element-network-settings.md). > [!NOTE] > 类不支持数据绑定。The class does not support data binding. 属性类不能绑定到数据使用`<%# %>`数据绑定表达式语法。Properties of the class cannot be bound to data using the `<%# %>` data-binding expression syntax. ## Examples 下面的代码示例从 Web 窗体页创建的 Internet 电子邮件。The following code example creates an Internet email message from a Web Forms page. 可以在窗体中输入消息的文本，也可以输入要用作邮件的正文的文本文件的名称。You can either enter the text of the message in the form or enter the name of a text file to use as the body of the mail. 代码定义的消息的两个字符串替换： 从窗体的文本框中的收件人列表的字符串将替换为"\<%%>"，并在指定的文本属性的字符串将替换为"\<从 %%>"。The code defines two string replacements for the message: the recipient list from the form's To text box will replace the string "\<%To%>", and the text specified in the property will replace the string "\<%From%>". 在此代码会生成 Web 窗体页上，可以单击**创建电子邮件，并仅显示**若要创建一封电子邮件和显示的属性Web 页中的对象。On the Web Forms page that this code generates, you can click **Create email and display only** to create an email message and display the properties of the object in the Web page. 单击**创建电子邮件并发送**Web 页中显示的电子邮件消息和将消息发送到使用 Internet 电子邮件的收件人。Click **Create email and send** to both display the email message in the Web page and send the message to the recipients using Internet email. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此控件具有接受用户输入，这是潜在的安全威胁的文本框。This control has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[MailDefinitionClassSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/CS/maildefinitionsamplecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MailDefinitionClassSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/VB/maildefinitionsamplevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置包含电子邮件正文文本的文件的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the file that contains text for the body of the email message.

value.span: 包含邮件正文文本的文件的名称。

span.span: The name of the file that contains the message body text.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定要使用的电子邮件正文的文本文件的位置。The property specifies the location of the text file to use for the body of the email message. 方法使用其`owner`参数将映射属性设置为在服务器上的路径。The method uses its `owner` parameter to map the property to a path on the server. 如果`owner`参数指向一个.aspx 页面上的控件或页面本身，属性指向与.aspx 页相同的目录中的文本文件。If the `owner` parameter points to a control on an .aspx page or to the page itself, the property points to a text file in the same directory as the .aspx page. 例如，如果.aspx 页位于 C:\inetpub\wwwroot\default.aspx，控件的外观对于 C:\inetpub\wwwroot 目录中的文本文件。For example, if the .aspx page is located at C:\inetpub\wwwroot\default.aspx, the control looks for the text file in the directory C:\inetpub\wwwroot. 如果.ascx 文件中包含的用户控件中使用类属性指向与该用户控件相同的目录中的文本文件。If the class is used in a user control contained in an .ascx file, the property points to a text file located in the same directory as the user control. 例如，如果.aspx 页位于 C:\inetpub\wwwroot\default.aspx 和用户控件位于 C:\inetpub\wwwroot\controls\control.aspx，对象查找文本文件 C:\inetpub\wwwroot\controls 的目录中。For example, if the .aspx page is located at C:\inetpub\wwwroot\default.aspx and the user control is at C:\inetpub\wwwroot\controls\control.aspx, the object looks for the text file in the directory C:\inetpub\wwwroot\controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性中输入的文本Web 窗体页上的控件。The following code example sets the property to the text entered in a control on a Web Forms page. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[MailDefinitionClassSample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/CS/maildefinitionsamplecs.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[MailDefinitionClassSample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/VB/maildefinitionsamplevb.aspx#3)]

member this.CC : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置将邮件的抄送件 (CC) 发送到的电子邮件地址的逗号分隔列表。

span.span: Gets or sets a comma-separated list of email addresses to send a copy (CC) of the message to.

value.span: 以逗号分隔的电子邮件地址发送到消息的副本 (CC) 列表。

span.span: A comma-separated list of email addresses to send a copy (CC) of the message to.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含的其他收件人的电子邮件的列表。The property contains a list of additional recipients of the email message. 如果属性包含格式不正确的电子邮件地址方法会抛出不发送异常和电子邮件。If the property contains an improperly formed email address, the method throws an exception and the email message is not sent. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性中输入的文本Web 窗体页上的控件。The following code example sets the property to the text entered in a control on a Web Forms page. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[MailDefinitionClassSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/CS/maildefinitionsamplecs.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[MailDefinitionClassSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/VB/maildefinitionsamplevb.aspx#4)]

summary.span: 创建通过 SMTP（简单邮件传输协议）发送的电子邮件。

span.span: Creates an email message to send by means of SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol).

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Net.Mail.MailMessage CreateMailMessage (string recipients, System.Collections.IDictionary replacements, System.Web.UI.Control owner);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Net.Mail.MailMessage CreateMailMessage(string recipients, class System.Collections.IDictionary replacements, class System.Web.UI.Control owner) cil managed
Public Function CreateMailMessage (recipients As String, replacements As IDictionary, owner As Control) As MailMessage
public: System::Net::Mail::MailMessage ^ CreateMailMessage(System::String ^ recipients, System::Collections::IDictionary ^ replacements, System::Web::UI::Control ^ owner);
member this.CreateMailMessage : string * System.Collections.IDictionary * System.Web.UI.Control -> System.Net.Mail.MailMessage

param.name: recipients
param.span: 用逗号分隔的邮件收件人列表。

span.span: A comma-separated list of message recipients.

param.name: replacements
param.span: ，包含字符串及其替换字符串的列表。

span.span: An containing a list of strings and their replacement strings.
The that owns this .

summary.span: 用文本文件创建通过 SMTP（简单邮件传输协议）发送的电子邮件。

span.span: Creates an email message from a text file to send by means of SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol).

returns.span: 来自一个文本文件的电子邮件。

span.span: The email message from a text file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建一个新对象，它可以使用发送方法。The method creates a new object that can be sent using the method. 必须设置属性以指示是否应作为纯文本格式的邮件消息 () 或 HTML ()。The property must be set to indicate whether the mail message should be formatted as plain text () or HTML (). `recipients`参数包含逗号分隔的电子邮件的收件人列表。The `recipients` parameter contains a comma-separated list of recipients of the email message. 如果`recipients`参数包含格式不正确的 Internet 电子邮件地址，方法会抛出不发送异常和电子邮件。If the `recipients` parameter contains an improperly formatted Internet email address, the method throws an exception and the email message is not sent. `replacements`参数是实例，它包含要替换的字符串列表。The `replacements` parameter is an instance that contains a list of strings to substitute. 字符串将替换为按顺序添加到集合，并且它们可以覆盖以前的替换。Strings are replaced in the order in which they were added to the collection, and they can overwrite earlier replacements. `owner`参数指示哪个控件是父级的控件。The `owner` parameter indicates which control is the parent of the control. 确定要搜索的文本文件中指定的 directory属性。It determines which directory to search for the text file specified in the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建对象，用于定义两个字符串 ("\<%%>"和"\<从 %%>") 的替换电子邮件中。The following code example creates a object that defines two strings ("\<%To%>" and "\<%From%>") that are replaced in the email message. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[MailDefinitionClassSample#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/CS/maildefinitionsamplecs.aspx#7)] [!code-vb[MailDefinitionClassSample#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/VB/maildefinitionsamplevb.aspx#7)] 下面的代码示例使用方法从文本文件中创建新的电子邮件。The following code example uses the method to create a new email message from a text file. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[MailDefinitionClassSample#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/CS/maildefinitionsamplecs.aspx#8)] [!code-vb[MailDefinitionClassSample#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MailDefinitionClassSample/VB/maildefinitionsamplevb.aspx#8)]

\- or -

summary.span: 用文本文件创建通过 SMTP（简单邮件传输协议）发送的带有替换内容的电子邮件。

span.span: Creates an email message with replacements from a text file to send by means of SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol).

returns.span: 来自一个文本文件的带有替换内容的电子邮件。

span.span: The email message with replacements from a text file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建一个新对象，它可以发送与方法。The method creates a new object that can be sent with the method. `recipients`参数包含逗号分隔的电子邮件的收件人列表。The `recipients` parameter contains a comma-separated list of recipients of the email message. 如果`recipients`参数包含格式不正确的 Internet 电子邮件地址，方法会抛出不发送异常和电子邮件。If the `recipients` parameter contains an improperly formatted Internet email address, the method throws an exception and the email message is not sent. `replacements`参数是实例，它包含要替换的字符串列表。The `replacements` parameter is an instance that contains a list of strings to substitute. 字符串将替换为按顺序添加到集合，并且它们可以覆盖以前的替换。Strings are replaced in the order in which they were added to the collection, and they can overwrite earlier replacements. `body`参数包含电子邮件的文本。The `body` parameter contains the text of the email message. `owner`参数指示哪个控件是父级的控件。The `owner` parameter indicates which control is the parent of the control. 确定要搜索的文本文件中指定的 directory属性。It determines which directory to search for the text file specified in the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建对象，用于定义两个字符串 ("\<%%>"和"\<从 %%>") 的替换电子邮件中。The following code example creates a object that defines two strings ("\<%To%>" and "\<%From%>") that are replaced in the email message. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取 实例的集合，这些实例通常用于在将电子邮件发送给用户前，将图像嵌入到 对象中。

span.span: Gets a collection of instances, typically used to embed images in a object before sending an email to a user.

value.span: 实例，用于将图像中的嵌入之前向用户发送一封电子邮件的对象。

span.span: An instances used to embed images in a object before sending an email to a user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的项返回的集合属性表示要在电子邮件中嵌入的项。The items in the collection returned by the property represent items to embed in an email message. 这些项可以包括图像文件，如公司徽标或其他图形。These items can include image files such as company logos or other graphics.

summary.span: 导致跟踪服务器控件的视图状态的更改，以便这些更改可以存储到服务器控件的 对象中。

span.span: Causes tracking of view-state changes to the server control so they can be stored in the server control's object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
